Class ClientRequests

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.technician.ClientRequests
public class ClientRequests extends Object
Class for handling HTTP client requests. Provides methods for sending GET and POST requests to a server.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientRequests

      public ClientRequests()
      Constructor for initializing the ClientRequests class. Sets up the base URL, HTTP client, and Gson instance.

  • Method Details

    • postRequest

      public String postRequest(String path, String user, Map<String,String> parameters) throws URISyntaxException, IOException, InterruptedException
      Sends a POST request to the specified path with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      path - The endpoint path for the POST request.
      user - The user making the request.
      parameters - A map of parameters to include in the request body.
      Returns:
      The response body as a string.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the URI is invalid.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.

    • getRequest

      public String getRequest(String path, String user, Map<String,String> parameters) throws URISyntaxException, IOException, InterruptedException
      Sends a GET request to the specified path with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      path - The endpoint path for the GET request.
      user - The user making the request.
      parameters - A map of parameters to include in the query string.
      Returns:
      The response body as a string.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the URI is invalid.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.
